description:
Welcome to the EMI and Stock Calculator app! Whether you're planning to purchase your dream home or car or just curious about the financial implications of your investments, our app has got you covered.¬†

The Simple EMI Loan Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use money tool that can help you work out any type of loan. You can get an idea of your weekly payments, loan amount, interest rate, and loan term with just a few clicks.

Tired of confusing loan EMIs and struggling with loan EMI calculations?
This EMI Calculator and Loan Compare app is your one-stop solution for all your financial calculations!

Loan EMI Calculator: Easy calculations for home, car, bike, and personal loans. This EMI calculator app is an advanced financial tool that is useful for day-to-day life and has all its useful features.¬†

Calculate your EMI (equated monthly installment) for any loan amount, interest rate, and loan term in seconds. Just enter the details and get a clear breakdown of your monthly payments, including principal and interest components.

This EMI Calculator app is useful as a car loan calculator, a home loan calculator, a bank FD and RD calculator, or other financial calculations. The EMI Calculator app is a simple loan calculation tool that helps the user quickly calculate EMI and view payment schedules. Use this loan EMI calculator to calculate your EMI and plan your loan repayment in an effective way. You can also easily compare two loans by using the Loan EMI Calculator app.

Loan EMI Calculator is a simple, fastest, and light-weight application useful as a loan EMI calculator or mortgage calculator for all calculations. Our stock calculator helps you analyze potential returns. Invest smarter, not harder.

This Loan EMI Calculator app allows you to calculate the following values by inputting all the other values, like,
EMI Amount
Loan Amount
Interest Rate
Period (in months or years)

Features of the EMI Calculator and Loan Compare app:

‚Ä¢ Calculate loan EMIs, interest rates, and repayment schedules.
‚Ä¢ Customize your loan details to get accurate calculations.
‚Ä¢ Save loan calculations for future reference.
‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use and intuitive interface
‚Ä¢ Compare loans and choose the best option for you.
‚Ä¢ Calculate the GST and VAT components of any given amount.

NOTES:
‚Ä¢ This app is working as a financial calculator app and not providing any lending services.
‚Ä¢ This Loan EMI Calculator-FFinance Tool app is just a financial tool and not any loan provider or connection with any finance services or any NBFC.

Our EMI Calculator App is your trusted companion for all your financial needs, providing accurate calculations and valuable insights to help you make informed decisions.

Thank you.
summary: The app is designed to simplify your calculations, planning to calculate taxes.
title: CashLoan - Loan EMI Calculator

description:
Plan your loans effortlessly with the Easyloan EMI Calculator! This tool instantly calculates your monthly payments, helping you stay in control of your finances. Simply enter the loan amount, interest rate, and tenure, and it will show you exactly what your monthly Installment will be.


1. EMI Calculator
EMI Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use app that helps you calculate your Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) for loans. Whether you are taking a home loan, personal loan, car loan, or any other loan, this app will help you calculate the EMI based on the loan amount, tenure, and interest rate.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Calculate EMI for any type of loan (Home Loan, Car Loan, Personal Loan, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Supports simple and advanced interest rate calculations
‚Ä¢ Quick EMI estimation based on loan amount, tenure, and interest rate


2. GST Calculator
The GST Calculator app is designed to help individuals and businesses easily calculate Goods and Services Tax (GST) for various products and services. Whether you're a consumer looking to understand GST rates or a business owner calculating tax on sales and purchases, this app simplifies the process.


3. RD Calculator
RD Calculator (Recurring Deposit Calculator) helps you calculate the maturity value of your recurring deposits. This app makes it easy for investors to estimate the interest earned and the maturity amount based on monthly deposits, interest rate, and tenure.


4. FD Calculator
FD Calculator (Fixed Deposit Calculator) is a handy tool for calculating the maturity amount on your fixed deposits. This app helps you quickly determine the interest earned on your FD, based on the deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure, making it easy to plan your future finances.


5. VAT Calculator
Quickly figure out the Value Added Tax (VAT) on your purchases. Just enter the cost price and VAT rate, and this tool will give you the VAT amount and total price. Ideal for keeping track of your expenses while shopping!

Important Notes:
‚Ä¢ This app is a financial calculator and does not provide any loan services or connect you with lenders.
‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs meant to help you calculate EMI, loan interest, and other financial figures.
summary: Calculate your loan EMI easily with the EMI Calculator app.
title: PROEMI - EMI Loan Calculator

description:
EMI Calculator : 
EMI Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use app that helps you calculate your Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) for loans. Whether you are taking a home loan, personal loan, car loan, or any other loan, this app will help you calculate the EMI based on the loan amount, tenure, and interest rate.

SIP Calculator : 
The SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) Calculator helps you calculate the potential returns from your SIP investments. Whether you're planning to invest in mutual funds or other financial instruments via SIP, this app provides an easy-to-understand and precise estimation of your future investment value.
Features:
‚Ä¢	Calculate SIP returns for monthly investments
‚Ä¢	Supports flexible investment durations (monthly, quarterly)
‚Ä¢	View investment growth over time
‚Ä¢	Easy-to-use interface with inputs for SIP amount, tenure, and expected returns
How it works:
‚Ä¢	Enter your monthly SIP amount, tenure (in years), and expected return rate
‚Ä¢	Instantly see your expected corpus value at the end of the investment period
‚Ä¢	Track and plan your SIP investment growth with ease

FD Calculator : 
FD Calculator (Fixed Deposit Calculator) is a handy tool for calculating the maturity amount on your fixed deposits. This app helps you quickly determine the interest earned on your FD, based on the deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure, making it easy to plan your future finances.

RD Calculator : 
RD Calculator (Recurring Deposit Calculator) helps you calculate the maturity value of your recurring deposits. This app makes it easy for investors to estimate the interest earned and the maturity amount based on monthly deposits, interest rate, and tenure.
How it works:
‚Ä¢	Enter the monthly deposit amount, interest rate, and tenure
‚Ä¢	Calculate the maturity amount and total interest earned
‚Ä¢	Get a detailed breakdown of your investment growth over time

Important Notes:
‚Ä¢ This app is a financial calculator and does not provide any loan services or connect you with lenders.
‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs meant to help you calculate EMI, loan interest, and other financial figures.

description:
BenevoLend is here to redefine how you access financial support, offering a seamless, transparent, and secure platform for your loan needs. Operated by BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED, BenevoLend connects you with certified financial services powered by our trusted Loan Provider, JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED. 

Who We Are 
JAI BABA FINANCE COMPANY PRIVATE LIMITED, our Loan Provider, is a fully certified Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) under Indian laws. Specializing in personal loan services, the Loan Provider has authorized BenevoLend to offer loan products on its behalf. We simplify the lending process, so you can access funds effortlessly, anytime you need them. 

Our Loan Offerings 
 Loan Amount: ‚Çπ1,000 to ‚Çπ1,00,000 
 Daily Interest Rate: 0.05% 
 Flexible Loan Tenure: 90 to 180 days 
 Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR): 18.25% 
 Service Fee: 0-5% (inclusive of 18% GST) 
 
1.Example Loan Calculation 
To help you better understand our transparent loan terms, here‚Äôs an example: 
 Loan Amount: ‚Çπ10,000 
 Loan Tenure: 90 days 
 Daily Interest Rate: 0.05% 

 2.Calculation: 
 Daily Interest: ‚Çπ10,000 √ó 0.05% √ó 90 days = ‚Çπ450 
 Service Fee (at 0%): ‚Çπ10,000 √ó 0% = ‚Çπ0 
 Amount Received: ‚Çπ10,000 - ‚Çπ0 = ‚Çπ10,000 
 Total Repayment Amount: ‚Çπ10,000 + ‚Çπ450 = ‚Çπ10,450 
 
 Note: Actual service fee percentages may vary based on your loan type. 
 
 Why Choose BenevoLend? 
 1. Fast Approvals 
 Say goodbye to lengthy loan processes. BenevoLend ensures instant loan approvals with funds disbursed directly to your account within minutes. 
 
 2. Affordable Interest Rates 
 Enjoy one of the most competitive daily interest rates in the market, starting at just 0.05% per day. 
 
 3. Flexible Loan Terms 
 Choose repayment plans that suit your financial needs. With loan tenures ranging from 90 to 180 days, you‚Äôre always in control. 

 4. Transparent Fee Structure 
 No hidden charges‚Äîwhat you see is what you get. Service fees are clearly outlined, ranging from 0-5%, and are inclusive of GST. 

 5. Secure and Reliable 
 Your privacy matters to us. BenevoLend uses advanced encryption and data protection protocols to keep your information safe. 
 
 How It Works 
 1.Sign Up: Register on the BenevoLend platform with your basic details. 
 2.Verify Your Identity: Complete a quick KYC verification process with your Aadhaar and PAN card. 
 3.Apply for a Loan: Choose the loan amount and tenure that fit your needs. 
 4.Get Approved Instantly: After verification, your loan is disbursed to your bank account. 
 5.Repay with Flexibility: Use the app to manage your repayments on time. 
 
Join thousands of happy customers who trust BenevoLend for their financial needs. With fast approvals, low interest rates, and a commitment to transparency, we are the go-to solution for quick and easy loans in India. 
 
BenevoLend ‚Äì Loans Made Simple, Secure, and Affordable.

developer.name: BENEVOLENT BPO SERVICES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
developer.legalAddress: 65-A, G/F Plot No 65, Gali No. 4, Kundan Nagar, New Delhi, Delhi 110092, India

title: BenevoLend

description:
Are you still worried about not having a spare fund? Fashion Rupee will solve this problem for you, and we will always provide you with efficient and personalized loan solutions, striving for excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

Fashion Rupee's partner NBFC is Jayachelve Financing And Leasing Private Limited, which is registered and regulated by the Reserve Bank of India.

Fashion Rupee provides intermediary services to help NBFCs connect with users, and does not provide loans directly to users. The purpose of this is to provide you with safe and compliant services.

Characteristics of loans
Loan amount range: ‚Çπ 5,000 to ‚Çπ 100,000
Maximum annual interest rate (APR): 22%
Handling fee: up to 1% of the loan amount, plus 18% GST
Repayment period: 100 to 730 days

How is the loan calculated
Assuming your loan amount is ‚Çπ20,000, the loan term is 180 days, and the APR is 20%, the specific calculation method is as follows
Handling fee: ‚Çπ 200 (1% * 20,000)
GST: ‚Çπ 36 (18% * 200)
Interest: ‚Çπ 1,972.6 (‚Çπ 20,000 * 20% * 180/365)
Loan cost: ‚Çπ 2,208.6=‚Çπ 200+‚Çπ 36+‚Çπ 1,972.6 (handling fee+GST+interest)
Total repayment amount: ‚Çπ 22,208.6=‚Çπ 20,000+‚Çπ 2,208.6 (principal+loan cost)
So your monthly repayment amount is: ‚Çπ 3,701.4=‚Çπ 22,208.6/6

Advantages of Choosing Fashion Rupee
100% online application process
Competitive loan amount and interest rate in the market
Transparent and secure processes
Absolute security of information

Who can apply?
We provide services to a wide range of clients and meet the following eligibility criteria:
Indian nationals
Age range: 20 to 55 years old
Stable employment: Applicants must have a stable income to qualify for loans

Contact
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time. Email: suggestions@nitrofinfinance.com+

Smart Finance was founded to meet the financial needs of users and solve their financial difficulties. As a partner of NBFC, our services are compliant and safe.

Who can apply
Indian residents
20-55 years old with stable income
Hold Aadhaar card, PAN card and active bank account

Loan features
Amount: ‚Çπ3,000 - ‚Çπ85,000
Term: Very flexible, 120 days to 365 days
Maximum annual percentage rate (APR): 24%
Processing fee: 1% of loan amount

Here is how the loan is calculated
Suppose your loan amount is ‚Çπ30,000, the loan term is 121 days, and the daily interest rate is 0.05%, then the specific fees are calculated as follows
Processing fee: ‚Çπ300=‚Çπ30,000*1%
Processing fee GST: ‚Çπ54=‚Çπ300*18%
Interest: ‚Çπ1,815=‚Çπ30,000*0.05%*121
Total repayment amount: ‚Çπ32,169=‚Çπ30,000+‚Çπ300+‚Çπ54+‚Çπ1,815

How to use Smart Finance
1. Download and install Smart Finance
2. Register
3. Submit loan application
4. Wait for review

Advantages of Smart Finance
Completely paperless online process
Transparent and clear fees
Absolutely secure information

How to contact us

description:
Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc can help you calculate the interest of installment loans and the principal and interest of each repayment.

How to use Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc?

1 Download and install Wise Loan: EMI Loan Calc from Google Play

2 Enter your mobile number to get OTP login. Tip: Creating an account is only for you to access your historical calculation records, and will not be used for other purposes. Your information is absolutely safe.

3 Enter Loan Amount, Interest Rate, Loan Term, and select Repayment Method to calculate the repayment amount and interest of each installment of the current loan.

4 Click Save to save your calculation record and generate a pie chart. The pie chart can clearly show the proportion of the current loan interest in the principal, which is convenient for you to make financial planning.

If you have any questions or comments, please contact us.

description:
This App will calculate your monthly payments instantly. It will enable you to remain in control of your finances. Enter the loan amount, interest rate, and tenure, and it will show you exactly what your monthly Installment will be. 

The app empowers users with quick estimates of their monthly payments, loan amounts, interest rates, and loan tenure. It enables a user to take informed financial decisions. The Loan EMI Calculator app is an advanced financial tool that is useful in day-to-day life with all useful features.

Our app is your trusted companion for simplifying all your loan and investment calculations. Whether you're planning to buy a home or a car or just explore financial opportunities, our app is here to make financial planning effortless.

With the help of the EMI Loan Calculator, your one-stop financial toolkit designed to make your life easier, you can quickly calculate loan EMIs, plan your investment with RD, and FD calculators. Easy Emi Calculator offers calculations like EMI, GST for daily use.

Loan Emi Calculator app saves time and reduce the chances of human errors thereby balancing speed and accuracy in financial calculations. It also allows you to do unit conversions easily.

The Simple EMI Loan Calculator is a simple and easy-to-use money tool that can help you work out any type of loan. You can get an idea of your weekly payments, loan amount, interest rate, and loan term with just a few clicks.

The Easy EMI calculator is a great way to determine the affordability of a loan and to make informed financial decisions.

EMI Loan Calculator Finance Tool allows you to edit and prioritize the list of calculators for easy access.LoanGuru - EMI Loan Calculator is a simple loan calculation tool that helps the user quickly calculate EMI.Use this app to calculate your EMI (Equated Monthly Installment), and plan your loan repayment in an effective way. You can easily compare multiple banks loans by using EMI Calculator.

With EMI Calculator app, you can save time and money by getting accurate loan calculations instantly, making it the perfect tool for anyone looking to manage their finances better.

Features of the Loan Planner App:

‚û§ Easy way to calculate your loan EMI.
‚û§ Calculate actual cost of No Cost EMI
‚û§ Compare with Standard EMI
‚û§ Quick Calc helps to analyze different combination of loan.
‚û§ Get insight of loan requirement by using different scenarios.
‚û§ Easy option available to compare between two loans.
‚û§ Maximize your investment returns by understanding the future value of your savings and investments.
‚û§ Calculate EMI and payment schedules for personal loans, ensuring you‚Äôre financially prepared for repayments.
‚û§ Calculate EMI on a monthly or yearly basis.
‚û§ Try different combinations to find your loan requirements in no time.
‚û§ Plan your mortgage payments and understand the impact of different interest rates and loan tenures on your finances.
‚û§ Simplify tax calculations and planning, ensuring you take advantage of all deductions and credits to minimize your tax burden.
‚û§ Calculate the GST and VAT components of any given amount.

NOTES:
‚Ä¢ This app is working as a financial calculator app and not providing any lending services.
